verbose_text: IVM activates GABA and glutamate gated chloride channels [XREF_BIBR], both of which belong to the Cys loop LGICs, which constitute a family of pentameric channels defined by a fixed-length cysteine loop in the N-terminal extracellular domain and four transmembrane (TM) regions.
evidence: IVM activates GABA and glutamate-gated chloride
